item.title: Hey please read and post
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Code for pickup is -

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Type ::pickup 995 100 for 100 GP."); } } }

Code for Npc is -

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } }

Just add them to your customCommands.

Read full topic
